ComicInfo.Summary:
After suffering a horrible defeat at the hands of the villains, Helsing and our heroes must regroup as Dracula prepares to use Hellchildâ€™s supernatural powers to banish all of humanity to the underworld and unleash hell on Earth. Brought to you by Wonderland writer Raven Gregory with incredible art by Delvis Goetten and Robby Bevard.
